archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1403
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a CSR I want the CRM to provide capability to assist with fault diagnostics and reporting or integrate to a tool that will provide this capability without having to navigate out of the CRM system so I can assist the customer in a timely manner

properties.value: Chorus from REQ_BSS_1360 or something else?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
